post: Special guest post from Veronica Pitts, BRIs 2025 National Civics Teacher of the Year, on how NCSS renewed her civic-education fire. What renewed yours?  https://bit.ly/4jFA765  #CivicEducation  #TeacherVoice  #NCSS

If students are already serving their community, theyre closer than they think. MyImpact Challenge accepts charitable, government initiatives, or entrepreneurial projects. 🗞️  #OTD 1988: Hazelwood v. Kuhlmeier - when can schools edit school-sponsored student journalism? How do you teach voice AND responsibility in class? Use this lesson for a fast, evidence-based discussion: 🔗  https://lnkd.in/eUS7wFrn  #TDiH  #FirstAmendment  #CivicEducation  #StudentPress

No cost to apply. Real upside: students advance through 2026  #NationalCivicsBee rounds powered by BRI-built civics questions and study supports, up to a national prize that includes a $100,000 education savings plan contribution. A single 30-minute civics lesson could be worth a $300 classroom award. In the Civic Star Challenge, teachers take lessons like Reconstruction & the Fourteenth Amendment,  log a short A250-aligned activity, and enter in just 2 minutes, no unit overhaul required. What lesson could you log this week? 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #America250  #TeachingResources  #StudentEngagement
